rooms.description: Grand entrance with a robust, minimalist Brutalist design featuring raw concrete surfaces and minimalistic detailing.
Spacious living area designed with exposed concrete beams and large windows to enhance natural lighting.
Open dining space adjoining the kitchen, integrating raw materials and a Brutalist aesthetic.

openings.description: Sturdy reinforced concrete door for the main entrance.
Large window that maximizes natural light while maintaining privacy.

additional_features.description: Brutalist-inspired swimming pool with minimalist landscaping.

vastu_considerations.entrance: North-facing entrance optimizes positive energy flow according to Vastu Shastra.
vastu_considerations.layout: Rooms and features are strategically placed to balance the energies of the plot.
vastu_considerations.materials: Use of raw concrete and exposed brickwork aligns with Brutalist style while respecting local aesthetics.
